rationale: The documentation does not mention the patient's concern about long-term effects of prednisone or the clinician's explanation of the risk-benefit balance.
The documentation accurately includes the clinician's advice on what to do if a dose of prednisone is missed.
There is no mention of the patient's intention to set a reminder for medication adherence.
The documentation does not include any inquiry about the patient's management of tiotropium.
The documentation does not provide any new or relevant information about the patient's COPD management or symptoms.
There is no discussion of the low risk of side effects at the current prednisone dosage.
